alert.note: Alert for Henry; Patrick (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 09 at 1:56PM EDT until August 09 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central Virginia and southwest Virginia, including the following counties, in south central Virginia, Henry. In southwest Virginia, Carroll and Patrick. * WHEN...Until 500 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 156 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Bull Run, Bassett Branch, Anglin Branch, Blackberry Creek, Ararat River, Bull Mountain Fork, Big Reed Island Creek, Birds Branch, Dan River and Archies Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Stuart... Ararat... Bassett... Patrick Springs... Critz... Sanville... Stanleytown... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: When it is safe to do so, please send your reports of flooding, including mudslides or flooded roads, to the National Weather Service by calling toll free at 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Reports and pictures can also be shared on the National Weather Service Blacksburg Facebook page and on Twitter.
